help-file.title: EXAMINE
help-file.content:
Syntax: examine <victim> | <object>
"Examine" may give you some valuable information about an item or character. It will also tell you what is inside a container, if it is open. When there is more than one object or character of the same name in the room and you wish to examine each one, use the following example as a guideline:
You are in a room and you see:
An ugly, drooling frog is standing here. An ugly, drooling frog is standing here. An ugly, drooling frog is standing here.
You wish to examine each one. You would type:
examine frog examine 2.frog examine 3.frog
